name: Erik Edlund
obverse_inscriptions: ER. EDLUND PHYS. PROF. R. АС. SC. SUEC. N. 1819 О. 1888
reverse: A woman stands in a hooded robe. In her right hand is a key, in the left hand, a burning torch. Beside her are a galvanometer and a some kind of electric appliance.
reverse_inscriptions: SOCIO SCRUTATORI RERUM NATURALIUM CELEBERRIMO R. ACAD. SCIENT. SUEC. MDCCCXCI.
description: This medal was commissioned by the Swedish Academy of Sciences to commemorate Erik Edlund,
a physicist who mainly studied electricity.
